text: .@PeteButtigieg gets big applause when he suggests providing health insurance for all. Crowd is mostly white in a state where 60% of Dem voters are black.
author: AndyShain

text: .@PeteButtigieg in Columbia - “Nationalism has claimed lives as far away as New Zealand and as close as Charleston.  Let’s do something about that.”
author: AndyShain

text: .@PeteButtigieg in Columbia: “Democracy is on the ballot in 2020.” Then criticizes voter ID laws, gerrymandering and the electoral college
author: AndyShain

text: Speaking in Columbia, @PeteButtigieg says Democrats need to have stronger voices in red states like SC and receives big applause when he suggests @LindseyGrahamSC is about to be retired

text: For 95 years, most SC public colleges have ignored a state law requiring students pass a test on the nation's founding documents. That's about to change, #scpol

text: Beto, Booker and Buttigieg all in SC today. But there's another "B" candidate not even in the 2020 race - Biden - capturing attention from voters, county Dem chairs tell @postandcourier in an exclusive story coming Sunday. #SC2020 #scpol

text:
A week after first revealing the $150 million project, SC Senate and House have sent bills offering job tax incentives to lure @Panthers HQ/practice complex to York County to their respective floors. Could be approved as early as next week.

text:
.@CityofColumbia misses out on UNC but lands No. 1 seeds Duke (ft. SC"s Zion Williamson) and Virginia to headline city's first NCAA men's tournament games since 1970. 
Also coming -> Ole Miss, Okla, VCU, UCF, Gardner-Webb + NC Central-North Dakota State winner. Games Fri & Sun.
author: AndyShain
